Sentencas: The aim of present investigation is to study the effect of co-doping of lanthanum and magnesium on the ionic conductivity of CeO2 for its use as a solid electrolyte in the intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT SOFC).
Titulo: Effect of co-doping of Mg and La on conductivity of ceria

Sentencas: Attempts have been made to synthesize compositions with x = 0.075, 0.07, 0.06, 0.05 and 0.00 and y = 0.00, 0.01, 0.03, 0.05 and 0.15 in the system Ce(1-x-y)Mg(x)LayO(2-x-y/2) (CML) by auto-combustion method.
Titulo: Effect of co-doping of Mg and La on conductivity of ceria

Sentencas: X-ray diffraction patterns show that all the samples have fluorite structure similar to undoped ceria.
Titulo: Effect of co-doping of Mg and La on conductivity of ceria

Sentencas: Microstructures of thermally etched samples have been studied by scanning electron microscopy (SEM).
Titulo: Effect of co-doping of Mg and La on conductivity of ceria

Sentencas: In order to evaluate the contributions of grains sigma(g), grainboundaries sigma(gb) and electrode-specimen interface to the total conductivity sigma(t), use is made of AC impedance analysis.
Titulo: Effect of co-doping of Mg and La on conductivity of ceria

Sentencas: Impedance measurements are made in the frequency range 1 Hz to 1 MHz and temperature range 250-500 degrees C.
Titulo: Effect of co-doping of Mg and La on conductivity of ceria

Sentencas: The results show that the conductivity of the system increases with increasing lanthanum content.
Titulo: Effect of co-doping of Mg and La on conductivity of ceria

Sentencas: There is no enhancement in conductivity due to co-doping with La and Mg.
Titulo: Effect of co-doping of Mg and La on conductivity of ceria
